Minnesota Soil Health Coalition Non-profit organization Crop residues are materials left in an agricultural field after the crop has been harvested. These residues include stalks and stubble (stems), leaves, and seed pods. Good management of field residues can increase the efficiency of irrigation and control of erosion. This residue can be managed biologically through soil health practices such as no-till, strip-till and cover crops. Healthy soil will break down the residue and crops can be planted directly into the soil through the residue. More information: https://mnsoilhealth.org/technical-information/ crop residue management crop residues

Goat Raising Basics – Introduction to Goat Farming This post is also available in: polski (Polish) Similarly to any other crop or livestock activity, if you possess the triangle “Land – Time – Energy”, then you can feel the joy of raising your own goats in your backyard. Regardless of whether you raise goats for their milk, for their meat or as pets, goat farming can be a major source of enthusiasm. It can also provide excellent dairy products and income, if done rationally and on a scalable basis. The first year of involvement is always introductory and one can make the necessary first steps as well as projections for a bigger investment (in time and money) for the following years to come. In 3-4 years, if you really enjoy keeping goats and you see results, you can extend your livestock activity and do it semiprofessionally, maybe at a more proper establishment than your backyard. Needless to say that commitment is the number one skill you must have. Goat or any other livestock cannot be left unattended for over a day. Thus, if you consider leaving let’s say for a weekend, you must find a reliable farm sitter to take care of your livestock. Managing livestock means caring, monitoring, feeding, cleaning, and troubleshooting 365 days a year. Furthermore, especially the dairy goats (on the milk side) must be milked twice a day; otherwise you put their health in danger. The average goat lives 10-13 years, but can reproduce (and produce milk) from 1-1,5 until 7-9 years old. There are -of course- striking exceptions to these age limits. 1.) How to raise Goats 2.) Evita Achmadi What Are Single Enzymes’ Mechanisms and Applications in Bakery Products? What types of enzymes are commonly used in bakery products? How to Optimize Usage of Single Enzymes in Bakery Product? How are single enzymes used in bakery products? What is amylase in bakery products and what is the mechanism and application in bakery products? What is the protease and what is the mechanism and application in bakery products? What is lipase and what is the mechanism and application in bakery products? What is glucose oxidase and what is the mechanism and application in bakery products? Enzymes can be added individually or in the form of complex mixtures in small quantities that act synergistically, antagonists, or additives during production. Supplementation of flour and dough with enzyme improvers is carried out to standardize flour for bread making. Application of enzymes in bread making is added during the mixing stage as a technological or processing aid with cereals as a raw material. Cereal components are used as substrates by enzymes to change biomolecules’ major and minor structures to achieve the desired functional properties. The type of substrate on which the enzyme reacts is used as the basis for classifying enzymes. Enzyme classification deals with the chemical structure and main characteristics of carbohydrates, proteins, and lipids, which are added to the description of enzymes. This is suitable with the International Union of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology (IUBMB), which recommends the name of enzymes in bakery products and the EC number, which can be seen in Table 1. Table 1. EC number and recommended name of enzymes in bakery products by IUBMB Enzymes usage in bakery products was considered characteristic, functionality, and classification, which will affect the quality of baking, including processing and final result of bakery products, especially texture. Classification and type of enzymes often used in bakery products can be seen in Figure 1. Figure 1. Type of Enzymes Used in Bakery Product α- and β-amylase are enzymes naturally present in cereals. α-amylase is an endo-enzyme that catalyzes the breaking of amylose and amylopectin bonds inside several branches and linear fragments. These fragments are called dextrins. β-amylase is an exo-enzyme that produces maltose. Exoenzymes are enzymes released by cells that perform their duties outside of those cells, whereas endoenzymes are enzymes secreted by cells that perform their functions inside those cells. The mechanism and properties of amylase determine the formation of starch structure in bread, recrystallization of amylopectin, bond formation of starch, and redistribution of water that occurs in the manufacture and storage of bread. During bread storage, the gelatinized starch network gradually transforms into an amylopectin crystallites network. Along with the amylopectin retrogradation process, migration of water vapor occurs between crumb structures, and water is immobilized in amylopectin crystallites. This is a result of less flexible gluten connections, which increases crumb toughness and decreases resilience. Proteolytic enzymes refer to proteases, proteinases, and peptidases that catalyse the hydrolysis of peptide bonds in proteins, which means that they can affect the physical properties of gluten. Proteases can be divided into 2 subclasses, endoprotease and exoprotease. Endoprotease hydrolyses peptide bonds in the inner protein of the polypeptide chain, resulting in ‘small peptides’ and even free amino acids. Exoprotease cut the ends of protein chains to produce free amino acids and sometimes small peptides. The presence of proteases on the physical properties of have beneficial effects. Protease enzymes improve the volume and porosity of bread, minimize the need for kneading the dough, and use less energy during processing. During proteolysis, the enzymes break the connections between peptides (smaller protein fragments) and disassemble the globular structure of gluten. This modification explains why gluten becomes better at emulsifying during the hydrolysis process. The breakdown of peptide bonds facilitates the interaction between peptides and lipids, which enhances emulsifying properties of gluten. Thus, more peptide residues become available at the interface between oil and water. This causes a decrease in surface tension and increases emulsification activity. However, it is important to note that excessive proteolytic activity can lead to extensive degradation of gluten, which causes a decrease in the emulsifying capacity of the hydrolysates. Therefore the ability of gluten to form stable emulsions decreases. Lipase is a lipolytic enzyme that facilitates the breakdown of ester carboxylic bonds and produces free fatty acids, diglycerides (DAG), monoglycerides (MAG) and glycerol. In baking, lipase was able to modify the dough properties through gluten and starch modification. Lipases improve dough handling properties. Improvement of the dough properties is characterized by increased dough stability, maximum resistance to stretching and hardness, and reducing the degree of softness and stickiness. The way lipase works is by breaking down fatty acids in fats, making them more polar (water-loving) and increasing their ability to interact with other substances. This increase in surface activity is a functional effect of the lipase. When lipase breaks down fats, it produces substances like monoglycerides and diglycerides, which act as emulsifiers. These emulsifiers can form complex structures with amylose in flour. These complex inclusions with amylose contained in flour can increase the specific volume and toughness of bread, making it lighter and more chewy. Glucose oxidase (GOX) oxidizes glucose into other substances. GOX also oxidizes water-soluble proteins (albumin and globulin). GOX makes the dough surface dry so it is easy to work with, improving formation and separation in the finished product. In addition, it impacts the rheological properties of the dough. It enhances dough stability, making it more resistant to stretching and reducing its extensibility. These changes can be observed in tests like farinograph, extensograph, and alveograph. By adding GOX to the dough, it strengthens the structure of the dough, improves bread quality, and modifies gluten proteins. Lipoxygenase (LOX) converts unsaturated fatty acids into peroxy radical fatty acids. This reaction requires oxygen. LOX catalyzes the peroxidation of unsaturated fatty acids. The production of H2O2 forms disulfide bonds in the protein gluten. The effect of LOX on gluten and dough is related to lipid oxidation by LOX, thereby triggering co-oxidation of SH groups in flour. LOX increases dough resilience to overmixing and deformation, as well as characteristics that are influenced by moisture absorption. It is important to note that excessive amounts of LOX can negatively affect the optimal viscosity and characteristics of the dough. LOX affects the properties of the dough which affects dough stability and crumbs in bakery products (softer texture, elasticity, suitability for cutting) and brightens the product (baguettes, toast, sandwiches). Single enzyme application as a food additive and processing aid can be optimized by considering the characteristics, mechanism of action, and understanding of enzyme regulation which are widely used in the bakery industry. Enzymes in the processing of bakery products have their respective roles according to the specific characteristics of the enzymes. The main role of enzymes in bakery products is to improve the functional and rheological properties of the dough according to the variation and type of bakery products, improve the quality and characteristics of bakery products such as volume, crumb texture, color, and taste, and extend shelf life (anti-staling). Optimization of the role and function of enzymes can be carried out by validating the concept of enzyme quality through baking tests including formulation development, process parameters (dough rheology, dough handling in the machine, temperature, and baking speed) as well as product appearance and sensory characteristics. Baking test results can be utilized as a guide for performing research and development in an effective and efficient process phase, which also lessens trial and error in the production process. Continuous research and development is one way to explore the potential of food enzymes applied to bakery products. Dr. Oinam Santosh Nutritional Value of raw Bamboo shoots Health Benefits of Bamboo Shoots Consumption World Bamboo Ambassador Health Beneficial Properties of Bamboo Shoots Bioactive Compounds in Bamboo Shoots Dietary Fiber in Bamboo Shoots Minerals in Bamboo Shoots Antioxidant Activities of Bamboo Shoot This post is also available in: Español (Spanish) Français (French) In the 21st century, bamboo shoot is recognized as a superfood and is used to prepare many food and pharmaceutical products. The utilization of bamboo shoots as food is mainly concentrated in Southeast Asian countries, and it still remains unexploited in other parts of the world (Santosh et al., 2023). Sustainable development, food safety control, and the clarification of their potential health effects are suggested for future consideration (Wang et al., 2020). The juvenile bamboo shoots are delicious as well as rich in nutrient components, mainly proteins, carbohydrates, minerals, vitamins, and dietary fiber, which exhibit great potential as a food resource. Based on USDA, 100g of raw Bamboo shoots contain: It has a high amount of antioxidants, and polyphenols, is low in fat, and is a good source of health-promoting bioactive compounds such as phytosterols, flavonoids, and phenolic acids. The nutritional and bioactive constituents of bamboo shoots are associated with several health benefits that include decreasing blood pressure, and cholesterol, increasing appetite, having anti-cancerous and anti-diabetic properties, reducing the risk of cardiovascular diseases, hypertension, obesity, cancer, and certain gastrointestinal disorders, lowers the level of sugar in the blood, promotes regularity, prevents constipation, antihyperglycemic, immunomodulatory, antiinflammatory, antimicrobial, cardioprotective, and neuroprotective abilities (Chongtham & Bisht, 2020). Bamboo is known for its therapeutic significance and is an integral part of the traditional medicinal system worldwide, including Ayurveda, Chinese, Indo-Persian, Unani, and Tibetan practises. Almost every part of bamboo, such as rhizomes, roots, culm, culm sheaths, seeds, leaves, sap, and shoots, are used for medicinal purposes for treating injuries, fever, skin infections, bleeding gums joint pains, and many more. Bamboo has been incorporated into many traditional formulas to treat lung, stomach, bone, and skin-related problems, wounds, and poisonous bites. Medical applications of Tabasheer were documented in Indian Ayurveda over 10,000 years ago as a fundamental constituent of Chyawanprash, a health tonic to bestow youth, beauty, and life (Nirmala et al., 2018). The medicinal properties of bamboo shoots were also documented in the book Compendium of Materia Medica of the Ming Dynasty (1368–1644), which mentioned the benefits of a liquid circulatory system (Yuming & Jiru, 1999). Extracts of leaves and shoots show potential antimicrobial, antiinflammatory, and wound-healing properties (Kalyan et al., 2023). The potential of bamboo shoots is gaining popularity in the food, nutraceutical, cosmeceutical, and pharmaceutical sectors due to their many health-promoting properties. Bioactive compounds, found in small amounts in food, can enhance the human body’s metabolic processes and provide health benefits by influencing activities such as antioxidant function, enzyme function, receptor function, and even gene expression. Bamboo shoots are a rich source of bioactive compounds with a combination of different dietary fiber components. In the pharmaceutical and nutraceutical industry, bamboo shoots can be a good source of phytosterol which is used for making steroids. Phytosterols serve as a precursor to several pharmaceutical steroids, and phenols function as free radical terminators, metal chelators, and singlet oxygen quenchers. Several phytosterol compounds have been identified in bamboo shoots, including 6-keto cholestanol, desmosterol, ergosterol, cholesterol, lanosterol, cholestanol, stigmasterol, campesterol, β-sitosterol, and stigmastanol (Chongtham & Bisht, 2020). There are several health-promoting properties of phenol such as antioxidant and antimicrobial activity, due to which bamboo shoots are gaining importance in the food industry. The isolation of compounds such as isovitexin, lupenol, glucose, ferulic acid, lyoniresinol, syringic acid, benzyl-O-β-D glucopyranoside, stigmast-4-ene-3,6- dione from bamboo species Bambusa textilis, Phyllostachys edulis, P. nigra, P. prominens, P. pubescens, Sasa coreana, S. veitchii (Indira et al., 2023). Park and John (2010) identified eight phenolic compounds from the shoot extracts of P. pubescens and P. nigra, which include protocatechuic acid, p-hydroxybenzoic acid, catechin, caffeic acid, chlorogenic acid, syringic acid, p-coumaric acid, and ferulic acid. Dietary fiber is a unique blend of bioactive components composed of indigestible plant parts and carbohydrate molecules that can bind and eliminate harmful toxins and carcinogens in the digestive tract. Bamboo shoots are a rich dietary fiber source with several health benefits, including treatment and prevention of obesity and diabetes, reduced cardiovascular diseases, and decreased incidence of certain types of cancer (Nirmala et al., 2009). The health benefits of dietary fiber from bamboo shoots were explored in a study by Park and Jhon (2009), which involved the comparison of a fiber-free diet with one containing bamboo shoot fiber and demonstrated the positive effects of bamboo shoot dietary fiber on improving bowel functions and reducing blood cholesterol levels. Bamboo shoots contain lignans, a significant fiber component known for its reported properties of anticancer, antibacterial, and antiviral activity (Santosh et al., 2023). Incorporating bamboo shoots into a daily diet can provide a wide range of health benefits, including improved digestive health, lower cholesterol levels, and reduced risk of chronic diseases. Minerals are the major groups of micronutrients essential for normal body growth, a vital role in maintaining the structural and physiological growth, and hormonal and regulatory functions of the body in building muscles and bones. Bamboo shoots are reported to have a good profile of minerals, including potassium, calcium, manganese, zinc, chromium, copper, iron, phosphorus, manganese, nickel, and selenium. Fresh bamboo shoots have a high content of potassium, reported up to 5980 mg/100g dry weight in B. bambos. Potassium is a crucial electrolyte that is essential for regulating blood pressure, maintaining fluid balance, and supporting proper muscle and nerve function (Chongtham et al., 2021). Magnesium is another mineral found in abundance in bamboo shoots. This mineral plays a critical role in maintaining healthy bones, supporting proper nerve and muscle function, and regulating heart rhythm. It is also essential for maintaining healthy blood sugar levels, which is crucial for individuals with diabetes or those at risk. Calcium, another vital mineral found in bamboo shoots, is essential for maintaining strong and healthy bones and also plays a crucial role in muscle and nerve function, blood clotting, and hormone secretion. Manganese, phosphorus, and zinc are other essential minerals found in bamboo shoots. The mineral content of bamboo shoots has numerous health benefits. Regular consumption of bamboo shoots can help regulate blood pressure, support healthy bones, aid in wound healing, and promote healthy digestion. Antioxidants are substances or compounds which inhibit the oxidation of other molecules in our body and prevent the formation of free radicals by scavenging them. It plays a significant role in promoting cardiovascular health, preventing diabetes, inhibiting cancerous tumor growth, slowing down the aging process in the brain and nervous system, and reducing the risk and severity of neurodegenerative diseases such as Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s disease (Mbah et al., 2019). Numerous natural compounds with antioxidant properties can be extracted from plants, such as phenols, polyphenols, vitamin C, vitamin E, beta-carotene, flavonoids, amino acids, and amines. These compounds have been identified to possess the potential to minimize the risk of chronic diseases. The main antioxidants in bamboo shoots are phenols, vitamins C and E, and mineral elements such as selenium, copper, zinc, iron, and manganese (Nirmala et al., 2018). Several identified antioxidants derived from bamboo shoots display certain biological roles, including anti-oxidative, anticancer, anti-hypertensive, and antibacterial. Bamboo, a fast-growing plant with abundant biomass, can provide an alternative source for producing natural antioxidants, which are currently in high demand due to the potential health hazards associated with synthetic antioxidants used in food and pharmaceuticals. What are the numbers we see on the eggs? What kind of label/certification can you find on an egg? This post is also available in: Español (Spanish) Ελληνικά (Greek) Depending on the region and the country you are in, there are different guidelines for egg marking. For example, in the US, egg cartons with USDA-gradeshield must display the pack date. This is a 3-digit code that represents the consecutive day of the year, starting with January 1 as 001 and ending with December 31 as 365. Regarding the classification of eggs: Grade AA eggs represent the highest quality eggs available for purchase. These eggs are characterized by their thick, firm egg whites (albumen), high and round yolks, and clean, unbroken shells. Grade AA eggs are particularly well-suited for cooking methods like frying and poaching. Grade A eggs, share the same exterior quality as Grade AA eggs, but their interior quality is slightly lower. In Grade A eggs, the egg whites are not as firm as those of Grade AA eggs. Based on EU legislation, A-grade eggs shall be graded by weight as follows: Grade B eggs, while still safe for consumption, do not meet the same standards of exterior or interior quality as Grade AA or Grade A eggs. Their egg whites are thinner, and their yolks are wider and flatter compared to higher-grade eggs. Additionally, Grade B eggs may exhibit irregular shapes and have rough or thin areas on their shells. Typically, these eggs are used in the production of liquid, frozen, and dried egg products and in various other egg-containing products. In the European Union, on every egg, you will find a tag that gives you a lot of information about the traceability of the egg. The first number is 0, 1, 2, or 3, which give us information about the production system 0 = Organic egg production 1 = Free-range eggs 2 = Indoor Housing (Barn) 3 = Furnished cages The letters stand for the country, and the last four numbers give us the information for the farm to which the laying hens belong. Cage-free are produced by hens that have the freedom to move around within a building, room, or open area that includes nesting spaces and perches. Free-range are similar to cage-free eggs, but the hens are also given access to the outdoors. Free-Run Eggs are sourced from hens raised in free-run housing systems, such as barns or aviaries. Pasture-raised are laid by hens that have the opportunity to roam and forage on a well-maintained pasture. Certified Humane: These eggs originate from facilities that adhere to specific standards for the humane treatment of farm animals, as established by the Humane Farm Animal Care Organization. American Humane Certified: These eggs come from facilities that have completed a third-party audit and certification process conducted by the American Humane Association, demonstrating their commitment to humane animal treatment. The standards they have, cover aspects such as providing nutritious food, creating suitable living conditions, responsible management, knowledgeable care, and considerate handling, transport, and slaughter practices. Certified Organic are produced by cage-free or free-range hens that are raised on certified organic feed. Pasteurized eggs undergo a controlled heating process at a specific temperature to eliminate harmful pathogens. Kosher Certified: The Kosher certification signifies that a product has been manufactured and processed in accordance with Jewish dietary regulations and complies with the stringent criteria set by the OU (Orthodox Union). This certification entails thorough inspections of the production facilities, ingredients, and production techniques to ensure compliance with kosher standards. Enriched: These eggs are laid by hens fed a specialized diet, often resulting in higher levels of nutrients such as omega-3 fatty acids (up to 10-20%). Vegetarian-fed: These eggs are laid by hens that are exclusively fed a vegetarian diet. Further reading USDA, https://ask.usda.gov/s/article/How-long-can-you-store-eggs-in-the-refrigerator4 Puglisi MJ, Fernandez ML. The Health Benefits of Egg Protein. Food Safety & Quality Microbiological risks in fruits and vegetables Allergens in food Biological Hazards in Food Physical Hazards in Food Chemical hazards in food Food Safety Hazards Although microbiological food outbreaks have historically been related to animal-origin products, the reality is that cereal, fruits, and vegetables are responsible for many food safety alerts. Contaminated foods or beverages […] What are the major allergens in food? Allergens in food are substances that can trigger an allergic reaction in individuals. Food allergies are abnormal responses to food. The immune system […] Which are the biological hazards in food? Kiwi Tree Share it: Ελληνικά (Greek) Ελληνικά (Greek) ( ) Show more translations Show less translations Kiwifruit is native to China and was initially called “Yang Tao.” It was renamed “kiwifruit” in New Zealand after the kiwi bird, which has a similar brown, fuzzy exterior. Kiwifruit was initially known as the “Chinese gooseberry” before its name change. Kiwifruit is an excellent source of dietary fiber, which aids in digestion, especially if you consume it with the peel. Kiwifruit contains more vitamin C per serving than most other fruits (almost three times the amount of Vitamin C in oranges). (Richardson, 2018) There are more than 50 species in the genus Actinidia , to which kiwifruit belongs. In addition to the traditional green ( Actinidia deliciosa ) and golden kiwifruit ( A. chinensis) , other varieties like red kiwifruit and baby kiwifruit Have been developed and grown in various regions. Kiwifruit continues to ripen after it’s picked, so it’s often sold when still somewhat firm. The high Vitamin C and low tannin content in kiwifruit are thought to explain why the cut fruit does not develop the typical browning reaction that occurs in most other fruits. Kiwifruit contains serotonin, which may help regulate sleep patterns and improve sleep quality. Kiwifruit is on the Environmental Working Group’s “ Clean Fifteen ” list, meaning it’s one of the least pesticide-contaminated fruits. China, Italy, and New Zealand are the top kiwifruit producers worldwide. Cornell University. Hardy kiwi (Actinidia arguta, Actinidia kolomikta). Bądź na bieżąco z szeroką gamą tematów związanych z rolnictwem oraz nadchodzącymi trendami i innowacjami, uczestnicząc w konferencjach, webinariach i wielu innych wydarzeniach na całym świecie. Sprawdź, co oferujemy. Pasjonujesz się rolnictwem i jesteś gotów dzielić się swoją wiedzą i doświadczeniem z ludźmi na całym świecie? Dołącz do społeczności Wikifarmer, stając się autorem na największej, tworzonej przez użytkowników platformie rolniczej i pomagaj rolnikom w podnoszeniu poziomu produkcji oraz prowadzeniu bardziej zrównoważonych upraw. Ruch w Internecie Ponad 18 milionów unikalnych osób odwiedzających portal Sieć Współpraca z uniwersytetami, organizacjami pozarządowymi i innymi organizacjami na całym świecie UNIKALNYCH UŻYTKOWNIKÓW WERSJI JĘZYKOWYCH KRAJÓW Łączymy siły z uczelniami wyższymi, organizacjami pozarządowymi i innymi organizacjami na całym świecie, pełniąc wspólnie misję w zakresie zrównoważonego rozwoju i dobrobytu człowieka. Wikifarmer to globalna platforma, której misją jest wzmocnienie pozycji rolników poprzez edukację i oferowanie im dostępu do otwartego rynku, aby mogli sprzedawać swoje produkty po uczciwych cenach. Sprzedawaj swoje produkty rolne w Internecie Dołącz do Wikifarmer, aby stać się członkiem najbardziej akredytowanego źródła darmowej wiedzy rolniczej. DEMOCRATIZANDO A AGRICULTURA A Wikifarmer é uma plataforma global com a missão de capacitar os agricultores através da educação e oferta de acesso ao mercado aberto para vender seus produtos a preços justos. Mantenha-se constantemente atualizado sobre uma grande variedade de tópicos agrícolas, tendências futuras e inovações participando de conferências, webinars e muitos outros eventos em todo o mundo. Dê uma olhada mais de perto em nossa lista. Você é apaixonado pela agricultura e está pronto para compartilhar seu conhecimento, experiência ou experiência com um público global? Junte-se à comunidade Wikifarmer tornando-se um autor na maior plataforma agrícola gerada por usuários e ajude os agricultores a melhorar sua produção e cultivar de forma mais sustentável. Tráfego da Web Mais de 18 milhões de visitantes únicos Rede Em colaboração com universidades, ONGs e outras organizações em todo o mundo USUÁRIOS ÚNICOS VERSÕES DE IDIOMA Unimos forças com ONGs, universidades e outras organizações globalmente para cumprir nossa missão comum de sustentabilidade e bem-estar humano. Venda seus produtos agrícolas online Junte-se ao Wikifarmer para se tornar membro da fonte melhor credenciada de conhecimento agrícola gratuito. ΠΕΡΙΣΣΟΤΕΡΕΣ ΑΠΟ ΕΠΙΣΚΕΠΤΕΣ ΑΠΟ ΤΙ ΛΕΝΕ ΓΙΑ ΕΜΑΣ ΟΙ ΣΥΝΕΡΓΑΤΕΣ ΜΑΣ Είσαι παραγωγός; ΕΚΔΗΜΟΚΡΑΤΙΖΟΝΤΑΣ ΤΗΝ ΑΓΡΟΤΙΚΗ ΠΑΡΑΓΩΓΗ Το Wikifarmer είναι μια παγκόσμια πλατφόρμα που έχει ως όραμα και στόχο να στηρίξει και να ενδυναμώσει τους αγρότες, προσφέροντάς τους δωρεάν πρόσβαση σε σχετικά εκπαιδευτικά άρθρα καθώς και στην εγχώρια και παγκόσμια αγορά ώστε να πουλήσουν τα προϊόντα τους σε δίκαιες τιμές. Παραμείνετε συνεχώς ενήμεροι για τις τελευταίες καινοτομίες, τις ανερχόμενες τάσεις και πολλά ακόμα θέματα του αγροδιατροφικού τομέα, παρακολουθώντας μια μεγάλη ποικιλία εκδηλώσεων παγκοσμίως. Δείτε την αναλυτική λίστα. Έχεις πάθος για την αγροτική παραγωγή και θέλεις να μοιραστείς τις εξειδικευμένες γνώσεις και την εμπειρία σου με ένα παγκόσμιο κοινό; Γίνε μέλος της ομάδας του Wikifarmer ως συντάκτης στην μεγαλύτερη πλατφόρμα του γεωργικού κλάδου, με κείμενα που δημιουργούνται από τους ίδιους τους χρήστες και βοήθησε τους αγρότες να αναβαθμίσουν βιώσιμα την παραγωγή τους. Επισκεψιμότητα Πάνω από 18 εκατομμύρια μοναδικοί χρήστες Δικτύωση Συνεργαζόμαστε με Πανεπιστήμια, ΜΚΟ και άλλους οργανισμούς από όλο τον κόσμο ΜΟΝΑΔΙΚΟΙ ΧΡΗΣΤΕΣ ΓΛΩΣΣΕΣ ΧΩΡΕΣ Ενώνουμε τις δυνάμεις μας με Μ.Κ.Ο., Πανεπιστήμια και άλλους οργανισμούς παγκοσμίως ώστε μαζί να μπορέσουμε να επιτύχουμε τους κοινούς μας στόχους για βιωσιμότητα και ευημερία των ανθρώπων. Πούλησε τα αγροτικά σου προϊόντα διαδικτυακά Εγγραφείτε στο Wikifarmer για να γίνετε μέλος της πιο διαπιστευμένης πηγής δωρεάν αγροτικής γνώσης. Με την εγγραφή σας αυτή συμφωνείτε στους όρους χρήσης και την πολιτική απορρήτου του Wikifarmer Έχετε ήδη λογαριασμό; Κάντε κλικ εδώ για να συνδεθείτε. Ξεχάσατε τον κωδικό πρόσβασής σας; Κάντε κλικ εδώ. Δεν είστε ακόμα μέλος, κάντε κλικ εδώ για να εγγραφείτε. Παρακαλούμε εισάγετε το email σας παρακάτω. Αμέσως μετά θα λάβετε ένα email με τις οδηγίες για την ανάκτηση του λογαριασμού σας. DEMOKRATISASI PERTANIAN Wikifarmer adalah sebuah platform global yang memiliki misi pemberdayaan para petani dengan mendidik dan menawarkan mereka akses ke pasar terbuka agar mereka dapat menjual produk-produk pertanian mereka dengan harga yang wajar. Tetap terus diperbarui tentang berbagai macam topik pertanian, tren mendatang, dan inovasi dengan menghadiri konferensi, webinar, dan banyak lagi acara di seluruh dunia. Lihatlah lebih dekat daftar kami. Apakah Anda bersemangat tentang pertanian dan siap untuk berbagi pengetahuan, pengalaman, atau keahlian Anda dengan audiens global? Bergabunglah dengan komunitas Wikifarmer dengan menjadi penulis di platform Pertanian terbesar yang dibuat pengguna dan bantu petani meningkatkan produksi mereka dan mengolah lebih berkelanjutan. Lalu lintas web Lebih dari 18 juta pengunjung tunggal Jaringan Bekerja sama dengan Universitas, LSM dan organisasi lain di seluruh dunia PENGGUNA UNIK VERSI BAHASA NEGARA Kami bergabung dengan LSM, Universitas-universitas, dan organisasi-organisasi lainnya secara global untuk memenuhi misi bersama kita tentang keberlanjutan dan kesejahteraan manusia. Jual produk pertanian Anda secara online Bergabunglah dengan Wikifarmer untuk menjadi anggota dari sumber pengetahuan pertanian gratis yang paling terakreditasi. 위키파머에 오신 것을 환영합니다 무료 농업 지식의 가장 공인된 출처 위키파머(Wikifarmer)에 오시 것을 환영합니다. 로그인 비밀번호 재설정 가장 인기 있는 카테고리 지속 가능성 사전 종자 수집 포도 재배 양봉 양 염소 특집 기사 재생 농업(Regenerative Agriculture)이란 무엇인가? 초보자를 위한 양봉 가장 인기 있는 기사 농원 농업(Plantation Agriculture)이란 무엇인가? 꿀벌 무리 Lavandula officinalis – 라벤더속 씨앗 겨울을 위한 벌집 준비 소개 비디오 가장 최근 기사 Salsola soda 씨앗 Vicia villosa 씨앗 Dolichos sesquipedalis – 장두 씨앗 Brassica oleracea – 빨간색콜라비 씨앗 Brassica oleracea capitata – 양배추 씨앗 Lactuca sativa longifolia – 로메인상추 씨앗 Panicum miliaceum – 서곡 씨앗 Dactylis glomerata – 오리새 씨앗 Hypericum perforatum – 서양고추나물 씨앗 Echinacea purpurea – 에키네시아 씨앗 Cuminum cyminum – 쿠민 씨앗 Urtica dioica – 서양쐐기풀 씨앗 Trigonella foenum-graecum – 호로파 씨앗 Sorghum bicolor – 수수새속 씨앗 Fagopyrum esculentum – 메밀 씨앗 Phleum pratense 씨앗 Medicago sativa – 자주개자리 씨앗 Poa pratensis – 왕포아풀 씨앗 Lolium perenne – 쥐보리속 씨앗 Beta vulgaris L. – 비트 씨앗 Brassica rapa L. – 브라시카 라파 씨앗 Borago officinalis – 보리지 씨앗 Fragaria x Ananassa – 딸기 씨앗 Portulaca oleracea – 쇠비름 씨앗 진행 예정 행사 (캘린더) 작가 되기 위에 이상 이상에서 온 방문객 그들이 우리에 대해 말하는 것 저희의 제휴사 농업인이신가요? 농업의 민주화 위키파머(Wikifarmer)는 농업인들을 교육시키며 그들의 상품들을 공정한 가격에 판매할 수 있도록 자유 시장으로의 액세스를 제공함으로써 농업인들에게 힘을 실어 주고자 하는 미션을 가진 글로벌 플랫폼입니다. 전 세계의 컨퍼런스, 웨비나 및 더 많은 이벤트에 참석하여 다양한 농업 주제, 향후 동향 및 혁신에 대해 지속적으로 업데이트하십시오. 우리의 목록을 자세히 살펴보십시오. 농업에 대한 열정이 있고 지식, 경험 또는 전문 지식을 전 세계 청중과 공유할 준비가 되어 있습니까? 가장 큰 사용자 생성 농업 플랫폼의 저자가 되어 Wikifarmer 커뮤니티에 가입하고 농부들이 생산을 업그레이드하고 보다 지속 가능한 방식으로 경작하도록 돕습니다. 웹 트래픽 1800만 명 이상의 단일 방문자 네트워킹 전 세계의 대학, NGO 및 기타 조직과 협력하여 고유 사용자 언어 버전 국가 저희는 지속 가능성 및 인류 복리 에 대한 저희의 공동 임무를 수행하기 위해 비정부 기구, 대학교, 세계적인 기타 기관들과 협력하고 있습니다. 온라인에서 여러분의 농산물을 판매하세요. 위키파머(Wikifarmer)에 가입하여 무료 농업 지식에 대한 가장 공인된 출처의 멤버가 되어 보세요. 회원 가입 시 위키파머(Wikifarmer)의 이용 약관 및 개인정보 보호정책에 동의하게 됩니다. 이미 계정이 있으신가요? 로그인 하시려면 여기를 클릭하세요. 비밀번호를 찾으시려면 여기를 클릭하세요. 아직 회원이 아니신 경우 여기를 클릭하여 가입하세요. 아래에 메일 주소를 입력해 주시기 바랍니다. 입력 후 회원님의 계정을 복원하기 위한 방법을 포함하고 있는 메일을 받게 되실 것입니다. 구글로 회원 가입 페이스북으로 회원 가입 등록하기 구글로 로그인 페이스북으로 로그인

DÂN CHỦ HÓA NÔNG NGHIỆP Wikifarmer là một nền tảng toàn cầu với sứ mệnh trao khả năng cho những người nông dân thông qua việc đào tạo và cung cấp cho họ phương pháp tiếp cận với thị trường mở để bán các sản phẩm của họ ở mức giá hợp lý. Luôn cập nhật liên tục về nhiều chủ đề nông nghiệp, xu hướng sắp tới và đổi mới bằng cách tham dự các hội nghị, hội thảo trên web và nhiều sự kiện khác trên toàn thế giới. Hãy xem kỹ danh sách của chúng tôi. Bạn có đam mê nông nghiệp và sẵn sàng chia sẻ kiến ​​thức, kinh nghiệm hoặc chuyên môn của mình với khán giả toàn cầu không? Tham gia cộng đồng Wikifarmer bằng cách trở thành tác giả trong nền tảng Nông nghiệp lớn nhất, do người dùng tạo và giúp nông dân nâng cấp sản xuất và canh tác bền vững hơn. Lưu lượng truy cập web Hơn 18 triệu khách truy cập đơn lẻ Kết nối mạng Phối hợp với các trường Đại học, các tổ chức phi chính phủ và các tổ chức khác trên toàn thế giới NGƯỜI DÙNG DUY NHẤT PHIÊN BẢN NGÔN NGỮ QUỐC GIA Chúng tôi kết hợp với các tổ chức phi chính phủ (N.G.O.s), Trường Đại Học và nhiều tổ chức khác để hoàn thành sứ mệnh chung là mang đến khả năng phát triển bền vững và thịnh vượng cho con người. Hãy bán các sản phẩm nông nghiệp của bạn online Hãy tham gia Wikifarmer để trở thành thành viên của nguồn kiến thức nông nghiệp miễn phí được công nhận nhất. Bằng cách Đăng ký, bạn đồng ý với Wikifarmer Thỏa thuận người dùng và Chính sách quyền riêng tư Đã có một tài khoản? Nhấp vào đây để đăng nhập. Quên mật khẩu? Nhấp vào đây. Chưa phải là thành viên, bấm vào đây để đăng ký. Vui lòng nhập email của bạn dưới đây. Sau khi gửi đi, bạn sẽ nhận được email chứa hướng dẫn để khôi phục tài khoản của mình. TARIMIN DEMOKRATİKLEŞTİRİLMESİ Wikifarmer, çiftçileri eğiterek ve ürünlerini adil fiyatlarla satabilmeleri için açık pazara erişimlerini temin ederek onları güçlendirme misyonuna sahip küresel bir platformdur. Dünya çapında konferanslara, web seminerlerine ve daha birçok etkinliğe katılarak çok çeşitli tarımsal konular, yaklaşan trendler ve yenilikler hakkında sürekli güncel kalın. Listemize daha yakından bakın. Çiftçilik konusunda tutkulu musunuz ve bilginizi, deneyiminizi veya uzmanlığınızı küresel bir izleyici kitlesiyle paylaşmaya hazır mısınız? Kullanıcı tarafından oluşturulan en büyük Tarım platformunda yazar olarak Wikifarmer topluluğuna katılın ve çiftçilerin üretimlerini yükseltmelerine ve daha sürdürülebilir bir şekilde yetiştirmelerine yardımcı olun. Web trafiği 18 milyondan fazla tek ziyaretçi Ağ Üniversiteler, STK'lar ve dünya çapındaki diğer kuruluşlarla işbirliği içinde BENZERSİZ KULLANICILAR DİL VERSİYONLARI ÜLKELER Sürdürülebilirlik ve insan refahına odaklanan ortak misyonumuzu yerine getirmek için küresel STK'lar, Üniversiteler ve diğer kuruluşlarla işbirliği yapıyoruz. Tarım ürünlerinizi çevrimiçi olarak satın En güvenilir ve en kampsamlı tarım kütüphanesinin bir üyesi olmak için Wikifarmer'a ücretsiz olarak katılın. Kayıt olduğunuzda Wikifarmer'ın Kullanıcı Sözleşmesini ve Gizlilik Politikasını kabul edersiniz. Zaten bir hesabınız varsa buradan giriş yapın Şifrenizi unuttuysanız buraya tıklayın Henüz üye değilseniz, kaydolmak için buraya tıklayın. Lütfen e-posta adresinizi aşağıya girdiğinizde hesabınızı kurtarmak için gerekli talimatları içeren bir e-posta alacaksınız. مرحبا بكم في WIKIFARMER يستخدم هذا الموقع ملفات ارتباط المصدر الأكثر اعتمادًا للمعرفة الزراعية المجانية مرحبًا بك في Wikifarmer تسجيل الدخول إعادة تعيين كلمة المرور الفئات الأكثر شعبية قاموس الاستدامة المقالات الأكثر شعبية Taraxacum officinale – طرخشقون بذور الزراعة الدقيقة – الفوائد والعوائق Gypsophila paniculata – جصية بذور تسميد البطاطس نبذة عنا أشرطة فيديو أحدث المقالات متطلبات تخصيب الأناناس احتياجات مياه الأناناس وأنظمة الري متطلبات التربة وتحضير الأرض لنبات الأناناس تاريخ الأناناس ، الاستخدامات والقيمة الغذائية ما هي الزراعة المائية؟ ما هي الزراعة الصحراوية؟ تعبئة وبيع وتصدير ثمار التنين حصاد فاكهة التنين وتخزينها . حماية نبات فاكهة التنين إخصاب فاكهة التنين متطلبات مياه فاكهة التنين وأنظمة الري تدريب شجرة فاكهة التنين وتقليمها تلقيح فاكهة التنين وانتشارها مسافات زراعة فاكهة التنين وتعريشة متطلبات التربة وإعداد الأرض لفاكهة التنين معلومات عن نبات فاكهة التنين والمتطلبات البيئية اختيار فاكهة التنين . فاكهة التنين: تاريخ المحاصيل ، القيمة الغذائية والاستخدامات حماية محصول الأناناس زراعة الأناناس – كثافة نبات الأناناس اختيار أنواع الأناناس معلومات نبات الأناناس والمتطلبات البيئية حصاد الأناناس ومناولتها وتخزينها وبيعها الأناناس المزهرة والتلقيح والتقليم الأحداث القادمة كن مؤلفا كتابنا خلال أكثر من زوار من الخارج ماذا يقولون عنا شركاؤنا هل انت مزارع ؟ دمقرطة الزراعة إن Wikifarmer عبارة عن منصة عالمية تقوم على مهمة تمكين المزارعين من خلال تعليمهم وتمكينهم من الوصول إلى السوق المفتوحة لبيع منتجاتهم بأسعار عادلة ابق على اطلاع دائم على مجموعة كبيرة ومتنوعة من الموضوعات الزراعية والاتجاهات القادمة والابتكارات من خلال حضور المؤتمرات والندوات عبر الإنترنت والعديد من الأحداث الأخرى في جميع أنحاء العالم. ألق نظرة على قائمتنا. هل أنت شغوف بالزراعة ومستعد لمشاركة معرفتك أو خبرتك أو خبرتك مع جمهور عالمي؟ انضم إلى مجتمع Wikifarmer من خلال أن تصبح مؤلفًا في أكبر منصة زراعية أنشأها المستخدمون وساعد المزارعين على ترقية إنتاجهم والزراعة بشكل أكثر استدامة. حركة مرور الويب أكثر من 18 مليون زائر منفرد مساحة التعاون بالتعاون مع الجامعات والمنظمات غير الحكومية والمنظمات الأخرى في جميع أنحاء العالم مستخدمون فريدون إصدارات اللغة الدول ونحن نضم صوتنا إلى دول منظمة "ن. ج. أو"، والجامعات، وغيرها من المنظمات على مستوى العالم من أجل الوفاء بمهمتنا المشتركة في مجال الاستدامة ورفاه الإنسان. بيع منتجاتك الزراعية عبر الإنترنت انضم إلى Wikifarmer لتصبح عضوًا في أكثر المصادر المجانية المعتمدة للمعرفة الزراعية . بالتسجيل، أنت توافق على اتفاقية المستخدم وسياسة الخصوصية لـ Wikifarmer. هل لديك حساب بالفعل؟ انقر هنا لتسجيل الدخول. هل نسيت كلمة المرور؟ انقر هنا. لست عضوا بعد، اضغط هنا للتسجيل. الرجاء إدخال بريدك الإلكتروني أدناه. بمجرد الإرسال، ستتلقى بريدًا إلكترونيًا DEMOCRATIZZARE L’AGRICOLTURA Wikifarmer è una piattaforma globale che ha l’obbiettivo di emancipare gli agricoltori attraverso l'educazione e l'accesso al mercato, per poter vendere i propri prodotti a prezzi equi. Rimani costantemente aggiornato su una grande varietà di temi in agricoltura, cambiamenti in arrivo ed innovazioni tramite la partecipazione a conferenze, webinar e molti altri eventi in tutto il Mondo. Dai un'occhiata alla nostra lista. Sei appassionato di agricoltura e ti interessa condividere la tua conoscenza, esperienza e competenza, le tue pratiche con tutto il Mondo? Unisciti alla comunità Wikifarmer, diventa un autore nella più grande piattaforma agricola creata dagli utenti stessi e aiuta gli altri agricoltori a migliorare la loro raccolto ed a coltivare in modo più sostenibile. ДЕМОКРАТИЗАЦИЯ СЕЛЬСКОГО ХОЗЯЙСТВА Wikifarmer – это глобальная платформа, ставящая своей целью расширение прав и возможностей фермеров, путем их обучения и предоставления доступа к открытому рынку для продажи своей продукции по справедливым ценам. Будьте в курсе самых разных сельскохозяйственных тем, новых тенденций и инноваций, посещая конференции, вебинары и многие другие мероприятия по всему миру. Посмотрите внимательнее на наш список. DEMOCRATIZAR LA AGRICULTURA Wikifarmer es una plataforma global con la misión de empoderar a los agricultores a través de la educación y el acceso al mercado abierto para vender sus productos a precios justos. Manténgase constantemente actualizado sobre una gran variedad de temas agrícolas, próximas tendencias e innovaciones asistiendo a conferencias, seminarios web y muchos más eventos en todo el mundo. Eche un vistazo a nuestra lista. ¿Te apasiona la agricultura y estás preparado para compartir tus conocimientos, experiencia o pericia con una audiencia global? Únase a la comunidad de Wikifarmer, conviértase en autor en la mayor plataforma agrícola generada por los usuarios y ayude a los agricultores a mejorar su producción y a cultivar de forma más sostenible. विकिफार्मर में आपका स्वागत है यह वेबसाइट कुकीज़ का प्रयोग करती है मुफ़्त कृषि ज्ञान का सबसे मान्यता प्राप्त स्रोत विकीफारमर में आपका स्वागत है लॉग इन करें पासवर्ड रीसेट सर्वाधिक लोकप्रिय श्रेणियां स्मार्ट खेती बीजों का संग्रहण स्थिरता शब्दावली वहनीयता अंगूर की खेती शहर की मक्खियों का पालना भेड़ अनाज भोजन विज्ञान प्रदर्शित लेख मसालों और जड़ी-बूटियों में खाद्य धोखाधड़ी चेरी की कटाई और उपज प्रति हेक्टेयर - क्या आप चेरी को तने के साथ या उसके बिना उठाते हैं? सबसे लोकप्रिय लेख Brassica oleracea acephala – केइलो बीज परिदृश्य दृष्टिकोण, और एकीकृत वाटरशेड प्रबंधन अनन्नास किस्म का चयन मकई के बारे में तेज़ तथ्य परिचय वीडियो सबसे हाल के लेख लाभ के लिए खीरे की खेती कैसे करें – व्यावसायिक खीरे की खेती खीरे का इतिहास, पौधों की जानकारी, रोचक तथ्य और पोषण मूल्य सोयाबीन रोग एवं प्रबंधन अभ्यास बीज उपचार एवं कृषि एवं खाद्य सुरक्षा हेतु इसका महत्व नींबू के पेड़ की सबसे लोकप्रिय किस्में फल-वृक्ष संबंधी शब्दावली एवं वर्गीकरण – फलकृषि विज्ञान मुर्गी पालन में साल्मोनेला को कैसे नियंत्रित करें? घरेलू और खुदरा स्तर पर साल्मोनेला का नियंत्रण और रोकथाम साल्मोनेला संक्रमण: कारण, लक्षण और नियंत्रण खाद्य जनित बीमारियाँ: कारण, सामान्य स्रोत और लक्षण डेयरी उत्पाद: प्रकार और पोषण मूल्य कृषि उपोत्पादों का उपयोग करके जैव-खाद बनाना प्राकृतिक ऑक्सीकरणरोधी: स्रोत, लाभ और अनुप्रयोग जैतून के तेल में खाद्य धोखाधड़ी चाय में कैटेचिन पचौली खेती गाइड – तेल के लिए व्यावसायिक रूप से पचौली कैसे उगाएं फसल सुरक्षा के लिए कृषि में रसायनों के सुरक्षित और प्रभावी उपयोग के लिए दिशानिर्देश ककड़ी की खेती में खरपतवार प्रबंधन खीरे की पैदावार, कटाई और भंडारण खीरे के कीट एवं रोग ककड़ी उर्वरक आवश्यकताएँ और विधियाँ ककड़ी सिंचाई आवश्यकताएँ एवं विधियाँ ककड़ी के लिए मिट्टी की तैयारी, मिट्टी और जलवायु की आवश्यकताएं, और बीज बोने की आवश्यकताएं खीरे की सर्वोत्तम किस्म के चयन के सिद्धांत आगामी इवेंट (कैलेंडर) एक लेखक बनें हमारे लेखक ऊपर इससे अधिक ओवर से आगंतुक वे हमारे बारे में क्या कहते हैं हमारे साझेदार क्या आप एक किसान हैं? कृषि का जनतंत्रीकरण Wikifarmer एक वैश्विक मंच है जिसका मिशन किसानों को शिक्षा प्रदान करना और मुक्त बाजार में अपने उत्पाद उचित दामों पर बेचने का अवसर देकर उन्हें सशक्त बनाना है। दुनिया भर में सम्मेलनों, वेबिनार और कई अन्य कार्यक्रमों में भाग लेकर कृषि विषयों, आगामी रुझानों और नवाचारों की एक विशाल विविधता पर लगातार अपडेट रहें। हमारी सूची पर करीब से नज़र डालें। क्या आप खेती को लेकर उत्साहित हैं और अपने ज्ञान, अनुभव या विशेषज्ञता को वैश्विक दर्शकों के साथ साझा करने के लिए तैयार हैं? सबसे बड़े, उपयोगकर्ता-जनित कृषि मंच में लेखक बनकर विकीफार्मर समुदाय में शामिल हों और किसानों को अपने उत्पादन को उन्नत करने और अधिक स्थायी रूप से खेती करने में मदद करें। वेब यातायात 18 मिलियन से अधिक एकल आगंतुक नेटवर्किंग दुनिया भर के विश्वविद्यालयों, गैर सरकारी संगठनों और अन्य संगठनों के सहयोग से अद्वितीय उपयोगकर्ता भाषा संस्करण देशों हमने दुनिया भर के गैर-सरकारी संगठनों, विश्वविद्यालयों और अन्य संगठनों के साथ मिलकर हमारे आम लक्ष्य - संधारणीयता और मानव कल्याण - को पूरा करने की ठानी है। अपने कृषि उत्पाद ऑनलाइन बेचें मुफ्त कृषि ज्ञान के सबसे अधिक मान्यताप्राप्त स्रोत का सदस्य बनने के लिए विकीफार्मर से जुड़ें पंजीकरण करके, आप विकीफार्मर से सहमत होते हैं उपयोगकर्ता का समझौताऔर गोपनीयता नीति पहले से ही एक खाता है ? लॉगिन करने के लिए यहां क्लिक करें पासवर्ड भूल गए? यहाँ क्लिक करें। अभी तक सदस्य नहीं हैं, साइन अप करने के लिए यहां क्लिक करें। कृपया नीचे अपना ईमेल दर्ज करें जमा होने के बाद, आपको एक ईमेल प्राप्त होगा जिसमें खाते को पुनर्प्राप्त करने के लिए निर्देश दिए गए होंगे आवश्यक पसंद सांख्यिकी विपणन समय-समाप्ति: 1 वर्ष प्रकार: HTTP समय-समाप्ति: 180 दिन समय-समाप्ति: Session प्रकार: HTML समय-समाप्ति: Persistent समय-समाप्ति: 2 वर्ष समय-समाप्ति: 1 दिन समय-समाप्ति: 2 दिन प्रकार: Pixel समय-समाप्ति: 3 महीने लंबित प्रकार: IDB उन डोमेन की सूची जिन पर आपकी सहमति लागू होती है: मेरी निजी जानकारी को न बेचें और न ही साझा करें शहद निर्माण करने वाली मधुमक्खियों की समाज संरचना और संगठन बकरी का संतुलित आहार घोड़ा पालन का परिचय अनुभवी अंतरराष्ट्रीय फल गुणवत्ता नियंत्रक, व्यापारी और किसान अनुसंधान परियोजना सुसाहचर्य कृषि विशेषज्ञ कृषिविज्ञानी प्लांट ब्रीडिंग एमएससी ICRISAT, पाटनचेरु, भारत में अनुसंधान विद्वान अंतरराष्ट्रीय टिकाऊ कृषि वानिकी, भूमि और मिट्टी प्रबंधन में विशेषज्ञ कृषि विज्ञानी पर्यावरण शासन और प्रबंधन, कृषि व्यवसाय सलाहकार संगठन खाद्य वैज्ञानिक पौधा प्रजनन मानद वैज्ञानिक सीएसआईआर-फोर्थ पैराडाइम इंस्टीट्यूट, बेंगलुरु, भारत जलवायु स्मार्ट कृषि और कृषि बीमा पर सलाहकार पोस्टडॉक्टरल फेलो सेंटर फॉर टेक्नोलॉजी आल्टरनेटिव्स फॉर रूरल एरियास (CTARA) घाना के कोको सिस्टम में विशेषज्ञता वाले कृषक कार्यक्षेत्र कृषि सलाहकार और पर्यावरण शिक्षक आनुवंशिक विज्ञान और पौधा प्रजनन में विशेषज्ञ पौधों के प्रेमी खाद्य विज्ञान और दुग्ध प्रौद्योगिकी में डी.वि.साइ. वैज्ञानिक कृषि लेखक, संचारक एवं मीडिया विशेषज्ञ गूगल के साथ साइनअप करें फेसबुक के साथ साइनअप करें पंजीकरण करवाना गूगल के साथ साइन इन करें फेसबुक साथ साइन इन करें पासवर्ड रीसेट करें

DÉMOCRATISATION DE L'AGRICULTURE Wikifarmer est une plateforme mondiale dont la mission est de donner du pouvoir aux agriculteurs en les éduquant et en leur offrant un accès au marché libre pour vendre leurs produits à des prix équitables. Restez constamment informé sur une grande variété de sujets agricoles, de tendances à venir et d'innovations en participant à des conférences, des webinaires et bien d'autres événements dans le monde entier. Jetez un coup d'œil à notre liste. Vous êtes passionné d'agriculture et prêt à partager vos connaissances, votre expérience ou votre expertise avec un public mondial ? Rejoignez la communauté Wikifarmer en devenant un auteur sur la plus grande plateforme agricole générée par les utilisateurs et aidez les agriculteurs à améliorer leur production et à cultiver de manière plus durable. DEMOKRATISIERUNG DER LANDWIRTSCHAFT Wikifarmer ist eine globale Plattform, mit dem Ziel, Landwirte zu stärken, indem sie sie ausbildet und ihnen Zugang zum freien Markt bietet, damit sie ihre Produkte zu fairen Preisen verkaufen können. Bleiben Sie stets auf dem Laufenden über eine Vielzahl von landwirtschaftlichen Themen, aufkommende Trends und Innovationen, indem Sie an Konferenzen, Webinaren und vielen weiteren Veranstaltungen weltweit teilnehmen. Sehen Sie sich unsere Liste genauer an. Sie haben eine Leidenschaft für Landwirtschaft und sind bereit, Ihr Wissen, Ihre Erfahrung und Ihr Know-how mit einem weltweiten Publikum zu teilen? Dann schließen Sie sich der Wikifarmer-Community als Autor auf der größten nutzergenerierten landwirtschaftlichen Plattform an und helfen Sie Landwirten, ihre Produktion zu verbessern und nachhaltiger zu wirtschaften. DEMOCRATISERING VAN DE LANDBOUW Wikifarmer is een wereldwijd platform met de missie om boeren mondiger te maken door hen op te leiden en hen toegang te bieden tot de open markt om hun producten tegen eerlijke prijzen te verkopen. Blijf constant op de hoogte van verschillende landbouwonderwerpen, opkomende trends en innovaties, door conferenties, webinars en nog veel meer evenementen over de hele wereld bij te wonen. Bekijk hier onze lijst. Ben je gepassioneerd door landbouw en klaar om je kennis, ervaring of expertise te delen met een wereldwijd publiek? Word lid van de Wikifarmer-gemeenschap door auteur te worden van het grootste, door gebruikers gegenereerde landbouwplatform, en help boeren hun productie te verbeteren en duurzamer te telen. Webverkeer Meer dan 18 miljoen bezoekers Netwerken In samenwerking met universiteiten, NGO’s en andere organisaties wereldwijd BEZOEKERS ΤALEN LANDEN We bundelen onze krachten met NGO, universiteiten en andere organisaties wereldwijd om onze gemeenschappelijke missie op het gebied van duurzaamheid en menselijk welzijn te vervullen. Verkoop je landbouwproducten online Word lid van Wikifarmer, de meest erkende bron van gratis landbouwkennis. Democratizing agriculture Wikifarmer is a global platform with the mission of empowering farmers through educating them and offering them access to the open market to sell their products at fair prices. Stay constantly updated on a large variety of agricultural topics, upcoming trends, and innovations by attending conferences, webinars, and many more events worldwide. Take a closer look at our list. Are you passionate about farming and ready to share your knowledge, experience, or expertise with a global audience? Join the Wikifarmer community by becoming an author in the largest, user-generated Agricultural platform and help farmers upgrade their production and cultivate more sustainably. Web-traffic Over 18 million unique visitors Networking In collaboration with Universities, NGOs and other organizations worldwide unique users language versions Countries Introducing Wikifarmer: the Wikipedia of Farming. Wikifarmer is the greatest user generated online farming library. Its mission is to help all farmers across the globe to find valuable information regarding their existing or potential crops and livestock. Users can submit a new article, edit an existing article, add pictures or videos, request a new article, ask a question about a related issue, or just browse through hundreds of pages with valuable information. A platform providing farmers/producers with valuable knowledge and access to the markets. A free online knowledge library where professional or amateur farmers can find best practices on growing their fields more effectively and an online marketplace where farmers can sell their products to buyers directly. Wikifarmer, is one of the lab’s most promising tech ventures on the rise. Education is also at the heart of Wikifarmer, a platform that offers quality, specialized content to the agriculture industry. It also acts as a transaction hub for landowners who wish to expand their sales and increase revenue. We join forces with N.G.O.s, Universities, and other organizations globally to fulfill our common mission on sustainability and human welfare.
